description: This file declares utility functions related to DHCP server operations, including preparing DHCP configurations, calculating DHCP ranges, handling DNS options, and updating DHCP configurations based on events.

methods.name: calculate_dhcp_range
methods.description: Calculates the DHCP IP address range and writes to the provided configuration file.

methods.name: prepare_dhcp_conf_static_hosts
methods.description: Sets up static host entries in DHCP configuration.

methods.name: prepare_dhcp_options_wan_dns
methods.description: Prepares DHCP options related to WAN DNS settings.

methods.name: prepare_whitelist_urls
methods.description: Prepares URL whitelists for DHCP configuration.

methods.name: do_extra_pools
methods.description: Configures additional DHCP pools based on parameters.

methods.name: check_and_get_wan_dhcp_dns
methods.description: Checks and retrieves the WAN DHCP DNS settings.

methods.name: get_dhcp_option_for_brlan0
methods.description: Retrieves DHCP options specifically for the brlan0 interface.

methods.name: prepare_static_dns_urls
methods.description: Prepares static DNS URLs in the DHCP configuration file.

methods.name: UpdateDhcpConfChangeBasedOnEvent
methods.description: Updates DHCP configuration based on specific events.
